body:
Hello Spack.io

Thanks in advance for your great product.

However i am struggling with mesa-glu@9.0.0%gcc@4.8.5.
I'm an on a offline RHEL site locked with the default RHEL 7.6 installation. I have created a spack-mirror using a spec file where I have included the lib above.
But there seems to be a compiler diff problem: "%gcc@:5.0.999" conflicts with "llvm@8:"

The problem can be reproduced by executing following command:
spack install mesa-glu@9.0.0%gcc@4.8.5
on a system with a gcc 4.8.5 compiler

Is this a bug ? or is there a workaround ? 
Any help is appreciated 
Best regards
Sten
title: mesa-glu@9.0.0%gcc@4.8.5
